name: 99 Balloons, Pop n Match 3
description:
*** App Store New and Noteworthy! ***
PopPopPopPopPop! That's the sound of five balloons sequentially popping! The visuals are fun and dynamic with each balloon rendered in full 3D and the colors changing with each new game. How fun is that! Tap to pop at least three balloons, but get as many as you can together for bigger scores and a chance to find the hidden present. You've only got 99 Balloons, so use them wisely. It's time to start popping ... 99 Balloons!

Highlights:
Ad supported version.
Shootout w/Friends.
Realistic Helium balloon physics.
Sequential popping.
Completely freeform packing.
Hidden present bonus.
Perfect game bonus.
New colors every game.
Dramatic lighting effects.
Multiple difficulty levels.
High score tracker.
Game Statistics.
